entries.title_d: The Commerce Raiders are becoming a problem that is quickly growing out of control. Intelligence has managed to get a lock on where the pirate's leader is laying low. Without their leader, Imperial Command hopes that the pirates will lose a great deal of their effectiveness. You are to destroy this leader.
entries.title: Eliminate Pirate Leader
entries.quest_location_d: Intelligence reports that the leader is staged along a busy commerical route in the Tatooine sector. You will recieve a Nav location to the Commerce Raider Leader's last confirmed location on reaching the Tatooine sector.
entries.quest_destroy_d: In order for the Empire to have any control over these nefarious pirates you will have to take out their leader. Destroy the Commerce Raider Leader.
